p: The peroxide index (PI) and thiobarbituric acid reactive substances (TBARS) analysis were performed to determine the formation of primary and secondary products, respectively, during milk fat oxidation. For PI determination, milk fat was extracted by centrifugation [ 26]. PI measurement was based on the oxidation of ferrous ions to ferric ions, a reaction that is catalyzed by peroxides [ 27]. The entire procedure was carried out in a dark room and was repeated on the same samples 24 and 96 hours after the first analysis.
